title: Yogurt and Frozen Berries
ingredients: 1 cup berries (such as blueberries, raspberries, or blackberries)
preparation: Divide the berries and yogurt between two bowls and sprinkle with the almonds (if using). Serve with the eggs.

for mixed berris add in::
